properties.name: Point 1
properties.clues:
1. The home of the famous Far Hills Race Meeting
  2. Located in the cetner of Far Hills
  3. Also home to the revived Essex Horse Trials

properties.name: Point 2
properties.clues:
1. A small private school in Far Hills, NJ
  2. Runs from Pre-School to 8th grade
  3. Mascot is the Falcons

properties.name: Point 3
properties.clues:
1. One of the only homes to public transportation in Far Hills
  2. Located in the cetner of Far Hills
  3. Right next to Butlers Pantry Trackside, a famous diner type food spot

properties.name: Point 4
properties.clues:
1. The best place to get milkshakes in Far Hills
  2. Can also refill prescriptions here
  3. Carries a number of other miscelaneous items, including anything from toys to toiletry items to food

properties.name: Point 5
properties.clues:
1. A private club where guests can ice skate, play paddle, and fox hunt
  2. Mascot is the foxes
  3. Most famous events are the Nafus Cup and the Winter Ice Skating Carnival
